name: SlingFighter
summary:
SlingFighterは1台で2人対戦できる簡単格闘ゲームです。

SlingFighter is a simple fighting game where two people can play against each other on one device.
The controls are simple: Just pull your character to launch it in a direction!
Enjoy exhilarating high speed action with just one finger!
Because of the wide variety of characters, each with their own techniques and abilities, each one feels like a different game.
At the time of release, there are 19 characters. 
More will be added in future updates.
info:
• 别名: スリングファイター
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: 格闘ゲーム
  • 发行日期: 2017-11-30

  • 官方网站: http://tenten.pya.jp/smartphone/spgame_slingfighter.html
  • 开发: moitititi (みっふい)
